column4: Im having some problems with the installation of Ubuntu 12.04 Server. When it comes to the "partition disks", I only see (1) Configure iSCSI, (2) a completely blank line, (3) Undo, (4) Finish -- (2) should normally have guided partitioning... Any ideas?
good question, the problem is it is blade server
any recommendation? i checked it with redhat and gparted live and they are able to see.
that still doesnt answer the question. how is the storage attached?
what do you mean by how they are attached?
ATA, SCSI, SATA, iSCSI, carrier pigeon
can i check it from an installed ubuntu?
figure out what the devices are, and then go from there
i just checked and yeah they are sata
i just checked and yeah they are sata
if you just run "ssh user@host -c experiment.sh &" then just check "jobs"
hmm, let me try that now
hmm, thanks let me read this :)
